#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Fisherman 's wife says : " Oh , you 're alive !
#Text=" Fisherman says : " What if , instead of an apology , I give him a free fish and we call it even ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Actually , I do n't eat meat .
#Text=" Fisherman says : " Fish ai n't meat !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Seriously , you 're still going to pay me , right ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , I think you were right before .
#Text=I 'm done dwelling on the past .
#Text=" Katara says : " Really ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't make guesses about what would have turned out if I had n't run away .
#Text=I 'm here now and I 'm going to make the most out of it .
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't think you 're gon na have those nightmares anymore .
#Text=" Fisherman says : " And if you were n't here now , well , I guess I would n't be either .
#Text=Thank you for saving my life , Avatar .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do you hear that ?
#Text=It stopped raining .
#Text=" Aang says : " Appa !

#Text=" Main Aang Appa Fisherman Gyatso ( flashback only ) Katara Iroh Momo Sokka Zuko Antagonists Ozai ( flashback only ) says : " Minor Air Nomad boy ( flashback only ) Bujing ( flashback only ) Fisherman 's wife Jee Jinju ( flashback only ) Pasang ( flashback only ) Tashi ( flashback only ) " Katara says : " Does n't it seem kind of weird that we 're hiding from the Fire Lord in his own house ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I told you , my father has n't come here since our family was actually happy .
#Text=And that was a long time ago .
#Text=It 's the last place anyone would think to look for us .
#Text="
